item.title: Sinkhole/pothole having caused an accident, 5th December
item.description:
There is a deep sinkhole/pothole in the road outside no 77 Eastcombe Avenue. I am witness to an accident. A cyclist was thrown off his bike and injured his face and teeth today, 5.12.2025 at 16.45 having hit the pothole in the dark. It is not possible to see the pothole in the dark. The cyclist is now on his way to hospital. Please fix this pothole before more people get injured.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Eastcombe Avenue, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken furniture & mattresses outside 56-57 Crofton Road. Also 15! blue bags, 5th December
item.description:
The blue plastic bags were dumped two weeks ago against our wall & our neighbours wall (nos 52 & 54 Crofton Road). They are blue Southwark garbage bags. Why are they still there??? There are similar bags in many other streets. Why? Outside No 56/58 there is a broken sofa & two old mattresses just dumped there
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 60, Crofton Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: To the rear of 102/104 robert street!!!!, 5th December
item.description:
Please note this complaint was raised in February 2025 and not actioned and needs addressed immediately. I have spoken to housing repairs and they say this lay with Highways. The picture with a box is where the hole is where the pavement has collapsed due to rats. So the pin point is not accurate. It is to the rear of the shops. But the app will not allow the pin drop unfortunately. Previously reported under case: 7162722

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Robert Street, Fitzrovia, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal parking and grass verge damage along Hurst Road outside Chis n Sid, 5th December
item.description:
Constant damage to grass verges from vehicles pulling up during school drop off in morning and pick up outside Chileshurst & Sidcup School. See pics from today a coach pulled up onto verge outside number 81 & 83 Hurst Road at 3pm! Causing issues for road users and pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 81, Hurst Road, Albany Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
